TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 表示在数据绑定控件中显示自定义内容的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that displays custom content in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由数据绑定控件 (如和) 以显示中显示每条记录的自定义内容。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display custom content for each record displayed. 当需要进行不由提供一种预定义的数据控件字段的数据绑定控件中显示内容 (如)，使用类来创建自定义用户界面 (UI)。When you need to display content in a data-bound control that is not provided by one of the predefined data control fields (such as ), use the class to create your custom user interface (UI). 具体取决于使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示对象。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控件显示对象作为列和控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, and the control displays it as a row. 可以定义自定义模板的不同部分对象使用下表中列出的模板。You can define a custom template for the different parts of the object using the templates listed in the following table. |模板Template|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定要显示有关中的交替项的内容对象。Specifies the content to display for the alternating items in a object.| ||指定要显示处于编辑模式中的项的内容对象。Specifies the content to display for an item in edit mode in a object.| ||指定要显示脚注部分的内容对象。Specifies the content to display for the footer section of a object.| ||指定要显示的标题部分的内容对象。Specifies the content to display for the header section of a object.| ||指定要在插入模式中的项显示的内容对象。Specifies the content to display for an item in insert mode in a object. 此模板仅受控件。This template is supported only by the control.| ||指定要为中的项显示的内容对象。Specifies the content to display for the items in a object.| 您可以隐藏通过设置数据绑定控件中的对象属性设置为`false`。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 作为定义自定义的替代方法或模板，你可以自定义的标头和表尾部分通过设置的其他属性的对象对象。As an alternative to defining a custom or template, you can customize the header and footer sections of a object by setting other properties of the object. 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示一个标题，请设置或属性，分别。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or the property, respectively. 而不是显示文本的页眉节中，您可以通过设置中显示图像属性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 标头部分可以隐藏在通过设置对象属性设置为`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 一些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 可以显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支持这些数据绑定控件单个绑定字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标头部分，使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性 （如果可用）。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 你还可以自定义外观通过设置该字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （字体颜色、 背景色等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置对象。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||脚注部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||标头部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的数据项的样式设置对象。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义相同单元中显示两个字段的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom object that displays two fields in the same cell. 名字和姓氏字段合并到相同对象。The first name and last name fields are combined into the same object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateField/CS/templatefieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateField/VB/templatefieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 将字段添加到动态创建的数据绑定控件时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要动态添加对象传递给数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象，定义适当的模板，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, define the appropriate templates, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用的控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管您可以向数据绑定控件动态添加字段，但强烈建议，字段是静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a field column to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldCtor/CS/templatefieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldCtor/VB/templatefieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示 对象中交替项的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying the alternating items in a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 中交替项的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying the alternating items in a .

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定为中的交替项显示的自定义内容对象。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the alternating items in a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现的交替项模板中定义的内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the alternating items are rendered. > [!NOTE] > 属性通常与结合使用属性数据绑定控件中创建的每个其他项不同的外观。The property is commonly used in combination with the property to create a different appearance for every other item in the data-bound control. 若要指定一个模板，请先打开和关闭``标记的开始和结束标记之间``元素。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，添加开始和结束之间的自定义内容``标记。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以是简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪个数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用的集合对象的访问控制。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 此外可以使用方法对象来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的属性创建自定义模板的交替项的字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the alternating items in a field column of a control. 该模板是由指定的模板的变体属性，其中的单元格在相反一侧显示图像。The template is a variation of the template specified by the property, where an image is displayed on the opposite side of the cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldalternatingitemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldalternatingitemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 对象绑定到的值为 时是否应将其转换为 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value that the object is bound to should be converted to if it is .

value.span: 如果在 绑定到的值为 时应将其转换为 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value that the is bound to should be converted to when it is ; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性适用于在模板中进行双向数据绑定语句。This property applies to two-way data-binding statements made in the template. 从双向绑定模板，并将值传递给数据源进行更新或插入操作之前提取这些值之后，执行该转换。The conversion is done after extracting the values from the two-way bound template, and before passing the values to the data source for an update or insertion operation. 例如，用户可以输入空字符串 ("") 的更新或插入记录时的字段值。For example, a user might enter an empty string ("") for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用属性指定是否为空字符串值自动转换为`null`时数据源中更新数据字段。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source.

span.span: Copies the properties of the current -derived object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用于复制的当前属性的帮助器方法-派生对象转换方法创建的对象。The method is a helper method used to copy the properties of the current -derived object to the object created by the method.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基方法以返回对象。The method overrides the base method to return a object.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必创建您的类型的新实例并调用基方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to create a new instance of your type and not call the base method.

summary.span: 获取或设置模板，该模板用于显示 对象中处于编辑模式中的项。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in edit mode in a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 中处于编辑模式的项的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in edit mode in a .

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定处于编辑模式中的项显示的自定义内容对象。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for an item that is in edit mode in a object. 通过创建一个模板，指定在编辑模式下的项的呈现方式定义的内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how an item in edit mode is rendered. 属性通常包含用户修改数据源中的值的输入的控件。The property usually contains input controls for the user to modify a value in a data source. 若要指定一个模板，请先打开和关闭``标记的开始和结束标记之间``元素。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，添加开始和结束之间的自定义内容``标记。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以是简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪个数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用的集合对象的访问控制。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 此外可以使用方法对象来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性处于编辑模式中创建自定义项模板的字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for an item in edit mode in a field column of a control. 该模板包含验证服务器控件，以防止用户将值字段留空。The template contains validation server controls to prevent a user from leaving a value field empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldedititemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldedititemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从当前表单元格提取由一个或多个双向绑定语句 () 指定的数据控件字段的值，并将这些值添加到指定的 集合。

span.span: Extracts the value of the data control fields as specified by one or more two-way binding statements () from the current table cell and adds the values to the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由派生自的类型实现，如。The method is implemented by types derived from , such as . 调用此方法以提取模板来填充字典的更新、 插入或删除操作要传递到数据源中的双向数据绑定字段的值。This method is called to extract the values of two-way data-bound fields in the template to populate dictionaries to be passed to the data source for an update, insert, or delete operation. 字段/值对存储在传递给方法的字典集合。The field/value pair is stored in the dictionary collection that is passed to the method. 调用方法`ExtractRowValues`方法的数据控件，如和。The method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的脚注部分中显示的自定义内容对象。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed in the footer section of a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现的脚注部分的模板中定义的内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the footer section is rendered. 若要指定一个模板，请先打开和关闭``标记的开始和结束标记之间``元素。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，添加开始和结束之间的自定义内容``标记。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以是简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪个数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用的集合对象的访问控制。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 此外可以使用方法对象来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来创建自定义模板的脚注部分的中的字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the footer section of a field column in a control. 该模板显示在值的总和字段列。The template displays the sum of the values in the field column. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldFooterTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldFooterTemplate/CS/templatefieldfootertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldFooterTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldFooterTemplate/VB/templatefieldfootertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示 对象的标头部分的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying the header section of a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示数据绑定控件中 的标头部分的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying the header section of a in a data-bound control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的标头部分的显示的自定义内容对象。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the header section of a object. 通过创建一个模板，指定如何呈现的页眉节中定义的内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the header section is rendered. 若要指定一个模板，请先打开和关闭``标记的开始和结束标记之间``元素。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，添加开始和结束之间的自定义内容``标记。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以是简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪个数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用的集合对象的访问控制。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 此外可以使用方法对象来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来创建自定义模板的页眉节中的字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the header section of a field column in a control. 该模板将显示一个复选框，允许用户以显示或隐藏的行控件。The template displays a check box that allows the user to show or hide the rows of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate/CS/templatefieldheadertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate/VB/templatefieldheadertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置模板，该模板用于显示 对象中处于插入模式中的项。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in insert mode in a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 中处于插入模式的项的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in insert mode in a .

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定在插入模式中的项显示的自定义内容对象。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for an item in insert mode in a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现在插入模式下的项模板中定义的内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the item in insert mode is rendered. 若要指定一个模板，请先打开和关闭``标记的开始和结束标记之间``元素。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，添加开始和结束之间的自定义内容``标记。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以是简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪个数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用的集合对象的访问控制。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 此外可以使用方法对象来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有数据绑定控件都支持此模板仅受数据绑定控件，可用于插入记录，例如此模板控件。Not all data-bound controls support this template This template is supported only by data-bound controls that allow you to insert a record, such as the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中处于插入模式创建自定义项模板字段中的行控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for an item in insert mode in a field row in a control. 该模板显示控件允许用户从预定义列表中选择一个值。The template displays a control that allows the user to select a value from a predefined list. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldinsertitemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldinsertitemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定为中的项显示的自定义内容对象。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the items in a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现项的模板中定义的内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the items are rendered. > [!NOTE] > 您可以选择定义属性结合属性数据绑定控件中创建的每个其他项不同的外观。You can optionally define the property in combination with the property to create a different appearance for every other item in the data-bound control. 若要指定一个模板，请先打开和关闭``标记的开始和结束标记之间``元素。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，添加开始和结束之间的自定义内容``标记。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以是简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先确定哪个数据绑定控件中的对象包含的控件。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用的集合对象的访问控制。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 此外可以使用方法对象来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来创建自定义模板的项字段中控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the items of a field in a control. 该模板显示在字段的值在控件。The template displays the field's value in a control. summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持页面回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support page callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不支持此类和始终使用，则会引发异常。The method is not supported for this class and always throws a exception.

exception.span: 调用该方法的默认实现。

span.span: The default implementation of this method is called.

span.para: 派生的类类可以重写此方法，以指示是否通过字段支持回调所包含的控件。若要指示支持回调，实现此方法作为空方法，不会引发异常;否则，使用有用的消息说明为什么不支持回调引发异常。

Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks. To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
